dsOverview.title: Russian Summary of Day, 1881-1989

summary.p: This dataset contains Russian summary of day data for 223 Russian stations, beginning as early as 1881 and continuing through 1989. Information in each day's summary includes maximum, minimum, and average temperatures and preciptation total.
